resources.string: The Pixel 3 XL is Google"'"s latest flagship smartphone. It promises to bring everything we have come to expect with the Pixel brand, including a clean build of Android, fast performance, quality camera and some cool software tricks that only Google can come up with

P-OLED, HDR 
6.3 inches, 100.3 cm2 (~82.8% screen-to-body ratio) 
1440 x 2960 pixels, 18.5:9 ratio (~523 ppi density) 
Corning Gorilla Glass 5 
Always-on display

Android 9.0 (Pie), upgradable to Android 12 
Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 (10 nm) 
Octa-core (4x2.5 GHz Kryo 385 Gold & 4x1.6 GHz Kryo 385 Silver) 
Adreno 630
